Listview light mode:
QListView::item:selected {background-color: #6495ED; color: #d0d0d0;}
QListView::item:focus {background-color: #0000ff; color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold;}
Listview dark mode:
QListView::item:selected {background-color: #6495ED; color: #d0d0d0;}
QListView::item:focus {background-color: #0000ff; color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold;}
